# Download and the Locate Course Material


## Step 1: Download Course Materials for Week-3

1. Visit the [course webpage](https://gwu-csci1010.archived2023.github.io).
2. Click on the "Schedule" tab to access the course schedule.

## Step 2: Download In-Class Python Exercise & HW2 for Week-3

- In the course schedule, find the "In-Class Python Exercise" and "HW2" section.
- You will see a **Download** button "![download-button](images/file-black.png){width=28}".
- Click on the **Download** button "![download-button](images/file-black.png){width=28}" next to "**In-Class Python Exercise & HW2**" to download the ZIP file.

## Step 3: Manually Unzip the ZIP File

### For Mac Users

1. Locate the downloaded **Week3.zip** file. It should be in your "**Downloads**" folder.
2. Double-click on the **Week3.zip** file to unzip it.
3. This will create a "**Week3**" folder inside which you can find the .ipynb and .csv files along with the "HW2.ipynb" file.

### For Windows Users

1. Locate the downloaded **Week3.zip** file. The ZIP file may be located in your "**OneDrive**" folder.
2. Right-click on the **Week3.zip** file and select "Extract All..."
3. Follow the on-screen instructions to unzip the file.
4. This will create a "**Week3**" folder inside which you can find the .ipynb and .csv files along with the "**HW2.ipynb**" file.

Congratulations! You are now ready to start working with the course materials. If you encounter any issues, don't hesitate to reach out to anyone from the instruction team via slack or email for assistance.

Enjoy your Python programming journey!
